column4: "Mace Tyrell; Lord of Highgarden and Warden of the South. The eldest son of Lord Randyll"
"Lord of Highgarden and Warden of the South. The eldest son of Lord Randyll Tarly; Samwell"
"more frightened; until Lord Randyll's disappointment turned to anger and then to loathing. "One time;" Sam"
"Lady Tarly gave her lord husband a second son. From that day; Lord Randyll ignored Sam"
"all sorts too. Why else have rangers and stewards and builders? Lord Randyll couldn't make Sam"
"have rangers and stewards and builders? Lord Randyll couldn't make Sam a warrior; and Ser Alliser"
"L-lord Randyll; he; he made me watch him dress animals sometimes; when � after �" Sam"
